column1: Smoque BBQ////Fantastic. Although it's a little out of the way
column2: I loved it. We had chopped and sliced brisket
column4: pulled pork and sides of macaroni and cheese
column5: cornbread and fries. It was a feast for all! It was delicious-- all of it-- and the guys were really nice and helped us share all of it with extra trays
column6: lots of napkins and awesome service.
